sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:20:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. Cook fettuccine pasta according to package instructions. 2. In a skillet, heat olive oil and butter over medium heat. 3. Add sliced chicken and cook until golden brown. 4. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant. 5. Pour in heavy cream and bring to a simmer. 6. Stir in grated parmesan cheese until melted and sauce is creamy. 7. Season with salt and pepper. 8. Toss cooked pasta with the sauce. 9. Garnish with chopped parsley and serve.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Italian">4f495a179791021069a3b6fce053afce</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Moderate">bee0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Chicken Breast (2, sliced), Fettuccine P</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Chicken Alfredo Pasta</name> <nutrition>Calories: 500, Protein: 30g, Fat: 25g, Carbs: 40g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Slice chicken. 2. Mince garlic.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:15:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:00:29</sys_created_on> <sys_id>34ac87979795021069a3b6fce053afa3</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:10</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
